desc: Made with organically grown bamboo, these ultra-soft washcloths are safe for both you & the planet. Free of all toxins, they gently cleanse skin.

layout.text: Spa-Like Softness: Made of viscose from 100% bamboo fiber, our skin-soothing washcloths feel softer & plusher than cotton. Use them to cleanse & exfoliate without scratching or over-scrubbing.
